title: Custom Product Shopping Flow
description: A multi-step form for customizing a product and submitting an order, complete with a visual progress bar and animated transitions. The form transitions seamlessly between steps using the .step.active class, which fades in and out content with smooth opacity changes (transition: opacity 0.5s ease). This creates an intuitive and visually appealing experience for users, guiding them through the customization and checkout process.
